00071   void testConstructor()
00072   {
00073     VECT(Bord) titi;
00074     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("VECT(), size nulle",0,titi.size());
00075     VECT(Bord) titi3(3);
00076     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("VECT(3), size 3",3,titi3.size());
00077     VECT(Bord) titibis(titi);
00078     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("VECT(vect), size nulle",0,titi.size());
00079     VECT(Bord) titi3bis(titi3);
00080     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("VECT(vect3), size 3",3,titi3bis.size());
00081   };
00082   void testCopy()
00083   {
00084     VECT(Bord) a;
00085     {
00086       VECT(Bord) org(3);
00087       org[2].nommer("OK");
00088       a=org;
00089       CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("operator=",3,a.size());
00090       CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("operator= copie interne",Nom("OK"),a[2].le_nom());
00091     }
00092 // on verifie apres destruction de org
00093     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("operator= copie interne",Nom("OK"),a[2].le_nom());
00094 // on recommence sur un vect non  nul
00095     VECT(Bord) aa(6);
00096     aa[2].nommer("erreur2");
00097     {
00098       VECT(Bord) org(3);
00099       org[2].nommer("OK");
00100       aa=org;
00101       CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("operator=",3,aa.size());
00102       CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("operator= copie interne",Nom("OK"),aa[2].le_nom());
00103     }
00104 // on verifie apres destruction de org
00105     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("operator= copie interne",Nom("OK"),aa[2].le_nom());
00106   }
00107   void testAcces()
00108   {
00109     VECT(Bord) a(3);
00110     for (int i=0; i<a.size(); i++)
00111       CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("test acces case",0,a[i].nb_faces());
00112     const VECT(Bord)& b=a;
00113     for (int i=0; i<a.size(); i++)
00114       CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("test acces case",0,b[i].nb_faces());
00115   }
00116   void testSearch()
00117   {
00118 // maintenant search/contient/rang ne sont dispoque pour Noms et Motcles
00119     Noms aa(3);
00120     aa[0]=("ok0");
00121     aa[1]=("ok1");
00122     aa[2]=("ok2");
00123 
00124     Nom titi;
00125     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("search titi ",-1,aa.search(titi));
00126     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("search a[2] ", 2,aa.search(aa[2]));
00127 
00128 // recherche par nom
00129     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("contient_ ok12 ",0,aa.contient_("ok12"));
00130     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("rang ok12 ",-1,aa.rang("ok12"));
00131     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("contient_ ok2 ",1,aa.contient_("ok2"));
00132     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("rang ok2 ",2,aa.rang("ok2"));
00133   }
00134   void testAdd()
00135   {
00136     VECT(Bord) aa;
00137     Bord b;
00138     b.nommer("b");
00139     aa.add(b);
00140     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("size apres add ",1,aa.size());
00141     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("copie add ",Nom("b"),aa[0].le_nom());
00142     aa[0].nommer("ok0");
00143     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("copie add ",Nom("b"),b.le_nom());
00144     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("copie add ",Nom("ok0"),aa[0].le_nom());
00145     aa.add(b);
00146     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("size apres add ",2,aa.size());
00147     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("copie add ",Nom("b"),aa[1].le_nom());
00148 
00149 
00150     VECT(Bord) bb(aa);
00151     aa.add(bb);
00152     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("size apres add ",4,aa.size());
00153     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("copie add ",Nom("b"),aa[3].le_nom());
00154     SChaine E;
00155     E<<aa;
00156   }
00157   void testLecture()
00158   {
00159     {
00160       VECT(Bord) aa(3);
00161       aa[0].nommer("ok0");
00162 
00163       aa[1].nommer("ok1");
00164       aa[2].nommer("ok2");
00165       SChaine out;
00166       out<<aa;
00167 // CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("apres printon ",Nom("3 ok0\nFaces::vide_0D\n ok1\nFaces::vide_0D\n ok2\nFaces::vide_0D\n \n"),Nom(out.get_str()));
00168       CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("apres printon ",Nom("3 ok0\nvide_0D\n ok1\nvide_0D\n ok2\nvide_0D\n \n"),Nom(out.get_str()));
00169       {
00170         VECT(Bord) bb;
00171 
00172         EChaine in(out.get_str());
00173         EChaine in2(out.get_str());
00174         in >> bb;
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("apres readon ",Nom("ok2"),bb[2].le_nom());
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("apres readon ",3,bb.size());
00177         bb.lit(in2);
00178         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("apres lit ",Nom("ok2"),bb[2].le_nom());
00179         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("apres lit ",3,bb.size());
00180 
00181       }
00182       {
00183         VECT(Bord) bb(16);
00184         bb[2].nommer("erreur");
00185 // readon interdit apres dimensionner
00186         EChaine in(out.get_str());
00187         bb.lit(in);
00188         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("apres lit ",Nom("ok2"),bb[2].le_nom());
00189         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("apres lit ",3,bb.size());
00190       }
00191     }
00192   }
00193   void testCurseur()
00194 
00195   {
00196 #ifdef curseurvect
00197     VECT(Bord) aa(3);
00198     aa[0].nommer("ok0");
00199 
00200     aa[1].nommer("ok1");
00201     aa[2].nommer("ok2");
00202     {
00203       int i=0;
00204       VECT_CURSEUR(Bord) curseur(aa);
00205       while(curseur)
00206         {
00207           Bord& b=curseur.valeur();
00208           Cerr<<b.le_nom()<<finl;
00209           CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("verif acces via curseur",aa[i].le_nom(),b.le_nom());
00210           ++curseur;
00211           i++;
00212         }
00213       CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("curseur bonne taille",3,i);
00214     }
00215     {
00216       const VECT(Bord)& ca= aa
00217                             CONST_VECT_CURSEUR(Bord) curseur(ca);
00218       int i=0;
00219       while(curseur)
00220         {
00221           const Bord& b=curseur.valeur();
00222           Cerr<<b.le_nom()<<finl;
00223           CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("verif acces via curseur",aa[i].le_nom(),b.le_nom());
00224           ++curseur;
00225           i++;
00226         }
00227       CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL_MESSAGE("curseur bonne taille",3,i);
00228     }
00229 #endif
00230   }
